messages.content:
Jeremy Corbyn and Labour are running a scare campaign on social care that's just not true.
But here's the really scary thing: it only takes the loss of 6 seats by the Government and we will have the chaos of a hung parliament that delivers Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister, propped up by the SNP and the Lib Dems. That is the biggest threat to social care.

mentions.candidate: Only Theresa May has a plan for Brexit and the ability to deliver.
mentions.tacticalSituation: But here's the really scary thing: it only takes the loss of 6 seats by the Government and we will have the chaos of a hung parliament that delivers Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister, propped up by the SNP and the Lib Dems.

issues.brexitEurope: Because just 11 days after you vote, the EU wants to start Brexit negotiations with Britain. And getting those negotiations right is central to everything - our economy, our finances, our position in the world, and our social care system.
issues.economy: Because just 11 days after you vote, the EU wants to start Brexit negotiations with Britain. And getting those negotiations right is central to everything - our economy, our finances, our position in the world, and our social care system.
issues.government: But here's the really scary thing: it only takes the loss of 6 seats by the Government and we will have the chaos of a hung parliament that delivers Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister, propped up by the SNP and the Lib Dems.
issues.socialWelfare: Jeremy Corbyn and Labour are running a scare campaign on social care that's just not true.

examples: But here's the really scary thing: it only takes the loss of 6 seats by the Government and we will have the chaos of a hung parliament that delivers Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister, propped up by the SNP and the Lib Dems.
Jeremy Corbyn and Labour are running a scare campaign on social care that's just not true.

Because just 11 days after you vote, the EU wants to start Brexit negotiations with Britain. And getting those negotiations right is central to everything - our economy, our finances, our position in the world, and our social care system.
Only Theresa May has a plan for Brexit and the ability to deliver.
Jeremy Corbyn and Labour are running a scare campaign on social care that's just not true.

But here's the really scary thing: it only takes the loss of 6 seats by the Government and we will have the chaos of a hung parliament that delivers Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister, propped up by the SNP and the Lib Dems.

Because just 11 days after you vote, the EU wants to start Brexit negotiations with Britain. And getting those negotiations right is central to everything - our economy, our finances, our position in the world, and our social care system.
Only Theresa May has a plan for Brexit and the ability to deliver.

But here's the really scary thing: it only takes the loss of 6 seats by the Government and we will have the chaos of a hung parliament that delivers Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister, propped up by the SNP and the Lib Dems.
Jeremy Corbyn and Labour are running a scare campaign on social care that's just not true.
